title: Нежный барс
overview: A young woman named Lyudmila works in a remote taiga reserve. She carries out a difficult man's task alone, holding the post of Deputy Director for Science. Her father once held this position, but he died... Now Lyuda has to fight poachers and save the taiga deer population.But what to do if bandits are increasingly shooting animals, threatening the management of the reserve, and cowardly management is in no hurry to come to the aid of employees? There is taiga for 500 kilometers around. There is nowhere to wait for salvation... Luda decides to figure everything out herself. A brave woman must single-handedly confront an entire gang of poachers...
